version_description:
When there’s an unprecedented situation, respond with unprecedented measures! Due to COVID-19, all of us MyScript employees are now working remotely.
We remain committed to improving Nebo with new features and bug fixes and our support team is at your service, should you need anything.
Maybe you are working from home too and need to share your meeting notes, insights or plans with your co-workers?
To help you with remote working in these extraordinary circumstances, we’ve decided to make the Publish Nebo Pro feature available for free.
Take care of you and your loved ones

• Page name: From now on, when you edit a page that doesn’t have a name, an automatic name will be generated from its first line of text.
• Bug fixes.

• Page name: From now on, when you edit a page that doesn’t have a name, an automatic name will be generated from its first line of text.
• Bug fixes.

** Insider 计划推出 **

我们一直在精研具创新性的新功能，并希望能让您提前获得预览。因此，我们今天推出 Nebo Insider 计划，让您在这些功能仍在完善时就可以抢先了解。

** 键盘（测试）**

我们听到了您的要求，等待结束了：现在您可以在 Apple Pencil 和键盘间轻松切换，让记笔记更快速。通过此最初版，您将可以：
•无需使用 Apple Pencil 即可添加文本，
•不论是手写或转换文本，您均可使用键盘编辑现有文本，
•在 Nebo 中选择并复制/粘贴文本或粘贴至任何其他应用。

请确保使用 MyScript 帐户登录，然后进入“设置 > Insider 计划”来激活键盘。现在，只需轻触空白线条或在文本块内点击两次即可放置光标并开始键入。
请注意，该功能仍在测试，未来会得到更新，以便在最终推出时提供更丰富的功能。请查看知识库了解更多。

感谢您帮助我们让 Nebo 更优秀！

We've been crafting innovative new features, and we'd love to offer you early previews. So we've launched the Insider program to give you an inside look while these features are being refined.

** Publish (beta) **

Share your notes with others through the Nebo website. Limit access to a list of contacts or allow anyone to view your note with a unique link.

** Keyboard (beta) **

New in 2.2.3: Dictate text with the iOS keyboard.

Easily switch between your Apple Pencil and your keyboard, and take your notes even faster.
• Add text without using your Apple Pencil.
• Edit existing text with the keyboard, whether it is handwritten or converted.
• Select and copy/paste handwritten or converted text in Nebo or to any other app.

Make sure to sign in with your MyScript account, then go to "Settings > Insider program" to view these features. 

Keep in mind they are still in beta, and will be updated along the road to offer extended functionality until the final release. 
Check our knowledge base to know more.

Thanks for helping us make Nebo even better!

我们听到了您的要求，等待结束了：现在您可以在 Apple Pencil 和键盘间轻松切换，让记笔记更快速。 

使用您的键盘来：
• 无需使用 Apple Pencil 即可添加文本。
• 不论是手写或转换文本，均可编辑现有文本。
• 粘贴拷贝自其他应用的文本。
• 听写文本（用 iOS 键盘）。

选择内嵌文本：
• 拷贝手写或转换文本，并将其粘贴到 Nebo 或任何其他应用。
• 只需轻按一下颜色条，即可改变文本颜色。
• 应用一种样式。
请查看知识库了解更多。

Nebo 2.3 还有以下功能：

** Insider 计划 **
想发现测试功能？请使用 MyScript 帐户登录，然后进入“设置 > Insider 计划”。
最近添加：发布。通过 Nebo 网站与他人共享笔记。对一个联系人列表限制访问或允许任何人通过唯一链接查看笔记。

感谢您帮助我们让 Nebo 更优秀！

We remain committed to improving Nebo with new features and bug fixes and our support team is at your service, should you need anything.
Maybe you are working from home too and need to share your meeting notes, insights or plans with your co-workers?

Take care of you and your loved ones

** 多级列表 **

创建带项目符号或编号的列表，并通过“编辑”菜单调整缩进。

** 缩进文本块 **

创建缩进文本块，并通过“编辑”菜单调整缩进。

** 改进的文本块重新排序 **

在两个相邻块之间放置块，而无需增加额外空间。

** 垂直间距 **

用两个手指长按可调整块之间、各部分内或大多数对象内的垂直间距。

** 文本显示 **

调整行高和基本字体大小，以获得最佳的书写或阅读舒适度。
